messages.message: `view-home-page.spec.ts` has been failing quite consistently in my PRs :sweat_smile: (run 18699 (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/18699/overview/b6d0e2cd-0b46-40b5-88cb-76804423b69e?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1)) <!subteam^S07855GV3GV>

we've been seeing a lot of timeouts

it's using `usePreExistingUser: true`, but i actually don't see too many Build/Converse projects for this user?

i'm not sure why we're getting so many timeouts :disappointed:

@Weiming Wu Do you think we can use newly created community users for these tests? For tests covering both community and commercial contexts? I think we should see less timeouts if we use newly created users.
It has been a while but I'm pretty sure that they'd be better off using new users
Cool Iâ€™ll try and update `view-home-page` to use newly created users
